page.title: 19INTERVIEW ON CHAS'S MUSIC.
page.content: {Q.Do you get the inspiration for songs {& practise with the band here? A.Dave & I write the songs here but we practise in studios in London. {Q.Has being famous altered your {family's life & has your talent been} {inherited? A.My children are musical but their lives have not been affected by mine. {Q.How did you & Dave get together?} A.We were in separate bands & became friends.After 9yrs we formed our own band.Several years later Mick,the drummer,joined us. {Q.Do you often go on tours?} A.We do a summer season at a seaside resort most years and sometimes do foreign tours.We seem to go down very well in the Middle-East for example. {Q.Do you enjoy your work?} A.Yes!.I am lucky to make my living by doing the things I enjoy the most.
